"Rossa": "Looks like you've really gotten the hang of things!"
"So listen, I've got a request for ya. Hear me out?"
"You've probably seen those Containers lyin' about all over Halpha."
"Some might be supplies left over from past ARKS operations, or random stuff that someone just left there."
"Whether deep underground or almost touchin' the clouds, you can find 'em just about anywhere."
"You ever notice how some of 'em got a different color? Y'know, the special-lookin' Containers?"
"Nobody knows who put 'em there. They're one of the seven wonders of Halpha."
"That's where you come in. I need you to investigate, and find as many of those Containers as ya can."
"Leave no stone unturned, no field uncombed. Find 'em and see what they contain. Easy, right?"
"Oh, alright... Well, if y'ever change yer mind, you know where to find me."
"Well, ain't you startin' to spread your wings! You're goin' places, I can tell."
"You've caught Crawford's eye too, looks like. So just keep doin' what you're doin'!"
"Mm... This mission looks like it's gonna be brutal."
"But hey, it's you we're talkin' about! Not to mention, you've also got us gals backin' you up!"
